transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Hello.
Hello.
Haan.
Haan good morning sir.
Bolo hello.
Bolo bolo.
India Mart se Vikas ji baat kar rahe hain.
Han madam bolo.
Ji actually sir aapko services regarding maine connect kiya koi issue ho to bataiye kyunki aapko. 
Are yaar bahut issue hai aapko har din bata raha hu main wahi problem hai ek hi din se bata raha hu to aap mahine ke liye call kar dete sirf aapki formality puri kar dete.
Apke manager se bolo baat karne ke liye.
summary:

- Issue with services; same problem for a month.

- Wants to speak to the manager.
